TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN TRAVELLERS <ATVC.O> REPORTS PRODUCTION
TEXT.BODY: American Travellers Corp's American Travellers Life Insurance Co unit said it wrote more than 1.1 mln dlrs of new business in May Last year, the unit wrote 553,350 dlrs of new business for the month of May. Reuter
